snippet: Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic overcame tough challenges in their quarterfinals at the Shanghai Masters.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Stanislas Wawrinka in men's quarterfinals of the Shanghai Masters; Novak Djokovic advances with win over Gael Monfils; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic overcame tough challenges in their quarterfinals at the Shanghai Masters.

headline.main: Nadal and Djokovic Advance in Shanghai Masters
headline.print_headline: Nadal and Djokovic Advance in Shanghai Masters
